dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, contact_cod, contact_nam, contact_typ, delete_flag, seq_nos, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from contact_rf where athena_id = ? order by seq_nos,contact_cod

dao.name: SEL_CONTACT1_COD
dao.statement: select contact_cod as value, contact_nam as display from contact_rf order by seq_nos

dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_NAM
dao.statement: select contact_nam from contact_rf where trim(contact_cod)= trim(:contact_cod)
